price: 8. (Al-lah les responde diciendo:) “No enviamos ángeles si no es con el castigo y, entonces, este no se hace esperar (sobre quienes niegan la verdad).
arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: mā nunazzilu al-malāikata illā bil-ḥaqi wamā kānū idhan munẓarīna
